articles.title: Boston College upset by mediocre Stanford in late-night showdown: ‘We’re not a good football team right now’
articles.description:
Boston College football coach Bill O’Brien has repeatedly emphasized that the Eagles have to learn how to not lose before they learn how to win. In Saturday’s matchup at Stanford – a sputtering program that entered 12-38 in its last 50 games – BC showed it still has a noticeably long way to go in […]

The post Boston College upset by mediocre Stanford in late-night showdown: ‘We’re not a good football team right now’ appeared first on Boston.com.
